<p>Configuration for probot-stale - https://github.com/probot/stale
Number of days of inactivity before an Issue or Pull Request becomes stale</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="yaml"><span class="hljs-attr">daysUntilStale:</span> <span class="hljs-number">60</span>
</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>

        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-2" id="section-2"></a>
</div>
<p>Number of days of inactivity before an Issue or Pull Request with the stale label is closed.
Set to false to disable. If disabled, issues still need to be closed manually, but will remain marked as stale.</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="yaml"><span class="hljs-attr">daysUntilClose:</span> <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>
</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>

        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-3" id="section-3"></a>
</div>
<p>Issues with these labels will never be considered stale</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="yaml"><span class="hljs-attr">exemptLabels:</span>
  <span class="hljs-bullet">-</span> <span class="hljs-string">pinned</span>
  <span class="hljs-bullet">-</span> <span class="hljs-string">security</span>
  <span class="hljs-bullet">-</span> <span class="hljs-string">roadmap</span>
</pre>
